channel.title: Making a NPC that heals you
channel.description: Hey guys need help making a NPC that heals you to normal hp, anyone know? Repping++ for help :)

item.title: Making a NPC that heals you
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:5, topic:402852”]use that same thing for an npc just do it like this, im just taking a shoot

if (npcs[i].npcType == npc_id) c.playerLevel[3] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Making a NPC that heals you

item.title: Making a NPC that heals you
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“voetbal645, post:4, topic:402852”]I know how to make a opbject heals you
go to actionhandler.java
and search for firstclickobject

you will see something like this
switch{
underneath add

case 153:
c.objectId = OBJECT ID;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.playerLevel[5] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
c.sendMessage(“I feel refreshed!”);[/quote]

That would be the code right there. The only thing you have to decide right now is how you would like the npc to add hp to you. If you would like it through dialogue you would have to add that code to an if loop where you add npc dialogue.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a NPC that heals you

item.title: Making a NPC that heals you
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“voetbal645, post:4, topic:402852”]I know how to make a opbject heals you
go to actionhandler.java
and search for firstclickobject

you will see something like this
switch{
underneath add

case 153:
c.objectId = OBJECT ID;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.playerLevel[5] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
c.sendMessage(“I feel refreshed!”);[/quote]

use that same thing for an npc just do it like this, im just taking a shoot

if (npcs[i].npcType == npc_id) c.playerLevel[3] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.playerLevel[5] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5);
